attributes.action: Investigate the new CGSE Chemistry Course
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the introduction of OCR 21 Century Science, The Chemistry content of the curriculum is greatly reduced in both content and depth of subject understanding. How are we supposed to stimulate and encourage intelligent young people to engage in a career that has the potential to research, develop and market new medical products for future generations.
